item.description:
Please update your RSVP for this Sundays event and reservation for Scoreboard.

We have had a bunch of Game Watching Events that have been well attended by multiple groups so this week we will return to our favorite suburban Sports Bar, Scoreboard in Woburn to watch the Patriots take on the Washington Redskins.

If you have never been to Scoreboard, it is located at 15 Middlesex Canal Park Lane next to the Holiday Inn and Showcase Cinema off Route 128 in Woburn. Scoreboard has 18 High Definition and Plasma TVs ranging in size from 50 to 92 inches. Parking is free. More info at http;//www.tpsscoreboard.com.

Red Sox Native and Assistant Organizer Lauren manages Scoreboard and has kindly set aside a reserved section for the Red Sox Natives and their guests. Boston Happy Hour drinking buddies are invited. Arrive early at 12:30pm to get yourself a prime seat and enjoy some pre-game socializing.

Game time is at 1pm.

Everone is responsible for their own food and drinks. Please maintain your own tab or pay as you order and tip your server. 

Join us early or later. Bring cool guests, friends and fans.

There is no cover, however space is limited so please RSVP here and update so Scoreboard can handle us.

We hope to see you there.

Frank and The Red Sox Natives Team
item.how_to_find_us: Ask the Scoreboard hostess to direct you to the Red Sox Natives reserved section..
item.name: Patriots Viewing Party - Patriots vs Washington Redskins at Scoreboard in Woburn
